website_summaries.verdict: Owners love the combination of chew type and a taste that many dogs enjoy. Stamp of approval from National Animal Supplement council and all natural ingredients are added benefits.
pros: Dogs respond well to it, with improvements in skin and coat
Also fights inflammation while supporting the brain and heart
cons: Some cats dislike the taste, so if you plan to use on your dogs and cats, keep that in mind
Some owners of dogs report challenges with the taste as well

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: So far I am super impressed not only with the product but with the service of Paw Struck. I received the Natural Omega 3 Fish Oil chew within 3 days of ordering the product. The ad on the product said "Perfect for picky eaters" It is SO true, I have 2 miniature dachshunds and they are super picky with their food and treats. When I offered the chews to them there was NO hesitation, they gobbled them down. Now every morning while I make my coffee they sit and wait for their Skin and Coat chew.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Bergen

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs were already on Pawstruck hip and joint. They were doing very well on those. We were giving fish oil capsules for skin problems. One dog took the capsule in a pill pocket with no problem. The other managed to eat the pill pocket and spit out the fish oil capsule, no matter what we tried. We tried these and our dogs love them just as well as the hip and joint supplements. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Former Marine or his wife

customer_reviews.title: and they both like the vitamin and eat it without any hesitation
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this supplement to my dogs for about 2.5 weeks. I was hoping for a shinier coat and less dry skin. So far I haven't noticed any difference but we have been having an extremely cold winter here in Michigan so my fur babies' skin is drier than normal. I have 2 pitbull mixes, one large and one medium size, and they both like the vitamin and eat it without any hesitation. I haven't noticed any bad side effects or vomiting. I just placed a second order so we will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: What works for some cats did not work for mine, but worth giving it a try!
customer_reviews.text: It was much appreciated that I could purchase a small sample for a very reasonable price. It arrived in a very timely manner. But my cat absolutely refused to touch it no matter how I presented it to her. Although I was disappointed in the outcome, it appears to work for some cats but not my dear Mabel.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Great for a shiny coat!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! I give them to my miniature pinscher and he gets so excited when he sees me pull out the container. Has a definite fishy scent, so I can tell that it really is packed with fish oil. My dog is older and these are great for helping keep his coat nice and shiny and great for his brain and joints, too
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: I rescued him and his coat wasn’t the greatest so this can’t hurt
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes and eats right away. I think he thinks it’s a treat. This is his first week taking them. He’s 8 years old and very playful and a quick learner. I rescued him and his coat wasn’t the greatest so this can’t hurt. Heart and mind will benefit too They arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a good choice however my dog won't touch it...
customer_reviews.text: Although the product does seem to be a good one, I have one dog that tears them up and another that won't touch them?? So for me that's a real bummer as one of them isn't going to get the Omega 3 benefit this month and I'll have to go with the previous brand which I didn't like as much as this one but it's the one they'll both eat. I'm really bummed out about this.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene E.

customer_reviews.title: He likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog, who has multiple allergies and a sensitive stomach, eats these supplements without any coaxing and tolerates them well. No vomiting! He has only been taking them for a few days, so it's too early to see any results in his skin and coat. If you've ever had the battle of trying to sneak medications into your dog, these chews are easy to break into smaller pieces if necessary, and my dog enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving my dog both the Pawstruck Omega 3 Chews and the Pawstruck Hip & Joint Supplements. I don’t know which one it is, or if it’s a combo, but these products seem to be making a huge difference in the quality of life for my dog. I highly recommend them. He’s acting like his old self and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Art R Navarro

customer_reviews.title: My cats won't touch it.  :(
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 3 stars because my cats don't like it at all and that may just be my cats. Your pets may love it. So I didn't think it was fair to give it a one star but that's the review my cats gave it. They won't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Dover

customer_reviews.title: great way to get picky dog to eat omega 3
customer_reviews.text: My dog was recently diagnosed with kidney disease and omega-3 supplements are recommended. We tried the oil kind - not a chance. So I tried these and she eats them like a treat :)
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Tampa

customer_reviews.title: It's not that I hate it but my cat will not eat it
customer_reviews.text: It's not that I hate it but my cat will not eat it. The information that is given about this product states that it can be purchased for cat as well as dogs. I m very disappointed. I will call the seller and see if they will issue a refund to me or offer an alternative that, hopefully my cat will like.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time getting my cat to eat these, so I have to crush and sprinkle it on her food. I think it's working fairly well- she had dandruff and now it's mostly gone.
customer_reviews.author: shelbzilla

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting source of heart healthy boost
customer_reviews.text: My toy poodle who needs these for a heart condition can’t get enough of these pills designed to keep his arteries clear.
customer_reviews.author: RL in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Both of my cats hated it.
customer_reviews.text: They just hated it and they dont hate anything. I tried everything to get them to eat it and nothing. I ended up just throwing them out.
customer_reviews.author: edgar herrera

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Product improved my Corgi's coat of hair and worked to get rid of her itching and dandruff. Reordered another one!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Tousignant

customer_reviews.title: Simply not suitable for felines
customer_reviews.text: Should not be marketed for cats. Probably fine for dogs. Cats won’t touch it and they are not picky eaters. Also HUGE treats, must be cut into fours and they crumble.
customer_reviews.author: Freebirdmarie

customer_reviews.title: dog loves this
customer_reviews.text: dog can't wait for these every day. needed for improving kidney function. seems to be working. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: P. g.

customer_reviews.title: Omega 3 for Pet
customer_reviews.text: I love these because my Pup love them! They help keep his skin and fur nice and shiny and helps cut down on his itchy scaly skin. And they cost me less than purchasing from the Vet's office.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as it arrived I gave a little to my 5 lb girl Yorkshire Terrier. Who is 14yrs old. I also like to sprinkle it on her food At her age I want her to have all these important ingredients
customer_reviews.author: SHELLEY K.

customer_reviews.title: my pups woof them down. just started taking this ...
customer_reviews.text: my pups woof them down. just started taking this. hoping it will ease up the scratching. will let you know
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Cat won't eat it! Tried hiding in her food ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat won't eat it! Tried hiding in her food and manages to work around it. Any suggestions? Her fur and skin are dry and she has lots of flakes and I thought this would help.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Fehr

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a try
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping my cat would like these. They are soft And I tried breaking them up as a treat and then putting them on top of her food But she picks it out and leaves it beside her dish. Would have been perfect f she would eat them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to give to pet
customer_reviews.text: works well. I have a hairless dog and it really helps her skin.
customer_reviews.author: Maelouise Cook

customer_reviews.title: My cats won't eat them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my cats. The product is probably good but neither cat will touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Honesty

customer_reviews.title: Now after a few weeks his skin seems better. He also loves the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I received these chews s few weeks ago for my 7 year old Border Collie. His skin has been a little dry and flaky. Now after a few weeks his skin seems better. He also loves the flavor. They are just like a treat to him!
customer_reviews.author: Dasherbordercollie

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamins for value
customer_reviews.text: I immediately noticed a change in our dogs pads on his feet and even his ears. He loves them, and he’s normally picky. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Draper Spellman

customer_reviews.title: was glad to just get a refund
customer_reviews.text: package came destroyed and my picky dog won't even touch them now since they are crushed...was glad to just get a refund. the idea seems great!
customer_reviews.author: JHammonds

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like good quality but couldn't really tell a difference.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has skin issues so decide to add these to his everyday life. They seemed great, my dog loved them as he thought they were treats. But I could not tell a difference. Results remained the same.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: our picky dog loved them and they seem to have made a difference in her skin and coat
customer_reviews.text: our chronically itchy dog loved these from the start, eagerly waited for her daily treat! she seems kess itchy, her coat feels softer, less dry. my only mild complaint is that our 8.5 pound baby gets only half a tab oer day. kind of a pain to cut them all and some if them crumble in the process. wish they made these for xtra small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: sps

customer_reviews.title: Not practical for cats.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my cat. The chews are too large for him and cutting them in half didn't help. My dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our dog who has an autoimmune disease that affects her skin/coat- definitely have noticed a difference in the quality of her coat. She LOVES the taste as well. We have a monthly subscription to these.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: My small puppy loves them. They are small enough and soft enough for her to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Loftus

customer_reviews.title: Thanks and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for you. I can see the difference already . Thanks and I highly recommend it. My dogs loves it. ON time delivery and reasonable price. It does the job, my dogs coating is very shiny.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoshopgirl

customer_reviews.title: They make the best pill pocket for her meds
customer_reviews.text: My dog Bella loves these. They make the best pill pocket for her meds. Form a ball around the pill and she wolf's it down. Giving her meds used to be a major pain. Nothing worked, but these Pawstruck Natural Omega 3 Fish Oil are great!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This controls my dog's shedding and makes his coat shiney. Totally recommended !
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Narsavage Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best
customer_reviews.text: My dogs coat is so much shinier and softer..it is amazing. Also, she doesn’t shed nearly as much. Now when I take her someplace people always comment on how beautiful she looks.
customer_reviews.author: chris rosetti

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my large dog. The product lasts a long time due to the serving amounts! Dog loves them
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hill

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes these
customer_reviews.text: These supplements seem to be yummy for my dog. It's hard to get her to take supplements but she seems to like these.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a picky eater and she takes this no problem! I noticed that her hair is softer.
customer_reviews.author: Hyo Y. Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Made her fur shiny and healthy
customer_reviews.text: Our Boxer had puppies and her fur looked horrible. These totally helped her regain her beautiful coat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Barney

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and Healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend these treats for ANY dog! Our Maggie Moo comes running when I twist open the container, which is a relief because we have tried other fish oil treats and she won't even look at them! We like the smell, texture and shape....and of course the health benefits. You have at least one happy customer that will be back for more!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Did not help dogs itching and dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Finished the entire tub and it did not do anything for my dogs itching and dry skin. Also the there is vegetable shortening in the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Cats won't eat them & surprise, neither will dogs
customer_reviews.text: My cats refuse to eat them and my Mom's Sheltie won't eat them either. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery and nice packaging. I use the chews either in my dogs food or as treats and he loves them. I have been using them for about a week now so probably too soon to notice a difference in coat, will post back after 30 days with results.
customer_reviews.author: wmichele

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to work better than others i have tried would recommend it with out a problem to others with dogs who scratch alot
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: Thicker & softer coat
customer_reviews.text: My cat's fur appears thicker & softer since using this product. I just sprinkle 1/2 a cube a day over wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted it to work but my cat would't eat them
customer_reviews.author: Marie Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Not all cats will like this.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and none of them liked it. They tasted it and walked away.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought because my dog has dry skin and was scratching. Less than 2 days after using product no scraping thank you
customer_reviews.author: daniel mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Great product, my dog Gus loves!
customer_reviews.text: I got these supplemements to try on my dog Gus and he loves them! They taste good I assume as he has no trouble gobbling them up and his coat seems to be softer so far! I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Norah loves this product!
customer_reviews.text: When I say treat, our Golden Doodle Norah runs to this jar. Little does she know that it is also really good for her! Trying to give her a pill is tough as she keeps spitting it out. But that isn't a problem with this product. I heartily recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: My dogs coat looked and felt smoother after 1 week ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs coat looked and felt smoother after 1 week using this product. The only complaint is how soft and crumbly they are, the bottom half of my bottle fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Cat didn’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: Cat wouldn’t eat it. Not even mixed with his wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Jensen

customer_reviews.title: The flavor and smooth texture included it's the key.
customer_reviews.text: Very good experience. High quality. My pets loves it a lot !!
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Helped with cat dandruff AND dog shedding!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newly adopted shelter cat, who had a little dandruff. I decided to give it to my 8 year old yellow lab and my 3 year old golden doodle/lab mix (what the heck, I thought!) The cat’s dandruff disappeared immediately but the surprise was that my big dogs both started shedding a lot less! Their coats look luxurious. Plus they all think it’s a treat. One note is they say to give 4 a day to dogs this size but 2 is plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rapuano

product_meta.title: Pawstruck Natural Omega 3 Fish Oil for Dogs & Cats Soft Chew Supplements with Omega-3 Fatty Acids, EPA, DHA, Vitamin E for Healthy Skin, Coat, Joints, Brain Function, Made in The USA
feature_bullets: SUPPORTS HEALTHY SKIN AND COAT so your dog looks and feels their best. Packed with Omega-3 fish oil for dogs and vitamin E to soothe itchy skin.
Promotes healthy immune system to help DOGS FEEL THEIR BEST. By reducing inflammation this soft chew supports healthy heart and brain function.

100% NATURAL AND MADE IN THE USA to ensure the SAFEST possible supplement soft chews. Buy with confidence knowing we hold ourselves to the highest quality standards and only sell products that we use on our own dogs. Additionally, this product is certified safe by the National Animal Supplement Council (NASC). Look for the NASC seal on our packaging!

A flavor that dogs love means this dog supplement is PERFECT FOR PICKY EATERS. If you’re tired of struggle with difficult pills and capsules that your dog won’t take, this chew with vitamin E is perfect for you.

At Pawstruck, we want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. That’s why we stand behind our 30-day SATISFACTION GUARANTEE. If these aren’t the best Skin and Coat supplements you’ve ever purchased, our customer care team is ready to help
